name: Cockpit Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Cockpit Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Cockpit API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Cockpit API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: collection

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

collection.name: collection
collection.description: Name of the collection to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
collection.natural_language_description: 参数名: Collection Name or ID | 作用: Name of the collection to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - Comma-separated list of fields to get
filter (值: None) - Filter query in Mongolite format
language (值: None) - Return normalized language fields
populate (值: None) - Whether to resolve linked collection items
rawData (值: None) - Whether to return the data exactly in the way it got received from the API
skip (值: None) - Skip number of entries
sort (值: None) - Sort query in Mongolite format

id.name: id
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Entry ID | (必填项)

jsonDataFields.name: jsonDataFields
jsonDataFields.description: Whether form fields should be set via the value-key pair UI or JSON
jsonDataFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Data Fields | 作用: Whether form fields should be set via the value-key pair UI or JSON | 默认值: False

dataFieldsJson.name: dataFieldsJson
dataFieldsJson.description: Form data to send as JSON
dataFieldsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Data | 作用: Form data to send as JSON

dataFieldsUi.name: dataFieldsUi
dataFieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Data | 作用: Form data to send | 默认值: {}

form.name: form
form.description: Name of the form to operate on
form.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form | 作用: Name of the form to operate on | (必填项)

singleton.name: singleton
singleton.description: Name of the singleton to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
singleton.natural_language_description: 参数名: Singleton Name or ID | 作用: Name of the singleton to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)
